text:
Tara Lyn Strong (born Tara Lyn Charendoff, born February 12, 1973) is a Canadian-American voice actress, actress and singer. She is known for her role as Bubbles in "The Powerpuff Girls" and Timmy Turner in "The Fairly OddParents".
Early life.
Strong was born on February 12, 1973 in Toronto, Ontario. Her father, who is Protestant, is from Scotland. Her mother who is Jewish, is from Britain of Russian descent.
She is fluent in English, Hebrew, Russian, and Scottish.
Personal life.
She is married to Craig Strong since 2000. They have two sons: Sammy (born 2002) and Aden (born 2004).
